author: rtk-rnjn
AAA3A
name: LintCodes
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. If you like my work, please consider donating on my [Buy Me a Coffee page](<https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aaa3a>)!
short: A cog to lint a code from Discord, with Flake8, PyLint, MyPy, Bandit, Black, Isort, Yapf, AutoFlake8, PyRight and Ruff!
description: A cog to lint a code from Discord, with Flake8, PyLint, MyPy, Bandit, Black, Isort, Yapf, AutoFlake8, PyRight and Ruff!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. Please note: all the code you run is stored on the wandbox.org server, even if you need a code to access it. To my knowledge, there is no way to request a deletion.
